This started during my BBA in Oil & Gas Marketing at UPES, where I first explored market trends and stakeholder dynamics, and evolved through my ongoing PGDM in Finance at Jaipuria, blending strategic thinking with tech innovation.

projects.title: Automated Lead Follow-Up System
projects.problem: Manual lead follow-up was slow and impersonal.
projects.context: The sales team was losing potential deals because they couldn't keep up with follow-ups, leading to a leaky pipeline and missed revenue opportunities.
projects.approach: I designed and built a system using Make.com and the GPT-4 API to automatically generate personalized follow-up emails based on lead data in HubSpot. The system also tracks replies, updates the CRM, and schedules the next action.
projects.outcome: Reduced manual email work by 90% and increased qualified lead response rate by 25% within the first month.

projects.title: Automated Market Research Agent
projects.problem: Market research was a time-consuming manual process.
projects.context: The marketing team was spending over 10 hours a week manually tracking competitor websites and news, causing them to react slowly to market shifts.
projects.approach: I deployed a research agent using Puppeteer for web scraping and the Claude API for summarization. The agent runs on a schedule, scrapes target sites, and delivers a concise intelligence digest via email.
projects.outcome: Saved the team 10+ hours per week and delivered consistently sharp, timely market insights.
